Archetype Ability Description: The Fathomless lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Starting at 1st level, your patron bestows upon you the ability to conjure a spectral tentacle of the deeps. As a bonus action, you can magically summon this tentacle, which extends from your shadow or from a space on the ground you can see within 60 feet of you.

The tentacle lasts for 1 minute or until you use this feature to summon it again. It counts as an ally for you and your companions, and it can hold, carry, or manipulate objects as if it were a hand. It can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

When you create the tentacle, you can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. When you reach 10th level in this class, the damage increases to 2d8.
As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the tentacle up to 30 feet and repeat the attack.

Starting at 6th level, the spectral tentacle you conjure with Tentacle of the Deeps can defend you and others. When you or a creature you can see within 10 feet of the tentacle takes damage, you can use your reaction to choose a different creature you can see within 10 feet of the tentacle. The chosen creature takes the damage instead.
This transfer of damage does not protect the tentacle, and the tentacle takes damage normally.

Starting at 10th level, the spectral tentacle gains the ability to grapple creatures. When you hit a creature with the tentacle created by Tentacle of the Deeps, you can use your bonus action to attempt to grapple the target. The target must make a Strength or Dexterity saving throw (its choice) against your warlock spell save DC. On a failed save, the target is grappled by the tentacle until the grapple ends.

At 14th level, you gain the ability to plunge into the watery depths and emerge unscathed. As an action, you can teleport yourself and up to five willing creatures you can see within 30 feet of you to a body of water you've seen before that is at least 20 feet in diameter. The body of water must be on the same plane of existence as you.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
